statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 1 AND amount > 1000.00
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR))
DELETE c, p FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE c.name LIKE 'John%'
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM rentals WHERE return_date IS NULL;
DELETE FROM rentals WHERE customer_id = 1 AND start_date < '2021-10-01'
DELETE FROM cars WHERE year < 2010 OR price > 50000
